name: 3bior1fand
params: wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3, wff w4

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wo(w1, w2), w3o(wa(w3, w4), w1, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wn(wa(w3, w4)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wo(w1, w2), w3o(wa(w3, w4), w1, w2)))
-| wi(w0, wn(wa(w3, w4)))

comment: A disjunction is equivalent to a threefold disjunction with single falsehood of a conjunction. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 8-Sep-2017.)
